divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my car driving to work. There was this bright light in the sky. I thought this was strange, because it was cloudy and there were no stars to be seen, but there was a bright light in the sky. I thought maybe the object was a plane or a hellicopter. The light was stationary, just a bright light in the sky. Today was the fourth time I have seen this light at the same time in the same place in the sky, in a week. Today was different, When I stopped for the red light I'm watching the light and it went out, like someone turned off a light switch. It just went away! At first I'm thinking , this can be explaned. It must be some kind of aircraft or I'm not really seeing what I think I'm seeing (a ufo). I was excited and scared! Has anyone else reported seeing this light in my area or I'm I going crazy?
